breadCrumbs.text: Choose how to build your bid pack

title: Choose how to build your bid pack
subtitle1: The information you enter into this service will create a bid pack that is shared with the suppliers so they can get a better understanding of your needs and how they can meet them.
subtitle2: You can either enter all the information online,or you can upload documents with your requirements and/or evaluation details
subtitle3: You can download a ranked list of suppliers at the end of your capability assessment and run your further competition outside our service if you wish do to so

hint.text: Enter all your requirement details online.
Upload a document with the required details.You can download a template to use.
